import React, {useEffect} from 'react' // import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap'; import './../style/hrsolution.css'; import heroImg from '../assets/images/hero-img01.jpg'; import Aos from 'aos' import 'aos/dist/aos.css' const HRSolution = () => { // create a reacte hook for scroll animation useEffect(()=>{ Aos.init({duration: 2000}) }, []) return <>

} export default HRSolution
